SELECT s.* , nvl(p.c,0)+1 count FROM TB_STUDY s, ( select STUDY_NUM,count(*) c from TB_PARTICIPANT where CONDITION = 2 group by STUDY_NUM) p where s.num = p.STUDY_NUM(+);
